actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code with regard to the additional sentence imposed for commission of a felony while using or unlawfully carrying a firearm.

summary.text: Amends provisions imposing additional sentences for commission of a Federal felony with the use of, or while unlawfully carrying, a firearm to (1) reduce the maximum authorized sentence, (2) increase the minimum authorized sentence for second and subsequent convictions, and (3) prohibit suspended and probationary sentences with respect to first, as well as subsequent, convictions.

titles.title: A bill to amend title 18 of the United States Code with regard to the additional sentence imposed for commission of a felony while using or unlawfully carrying a firearm.
